entity.name: Yamiche Alcindor
entity.description: American journalist; White House correspondent for PBS NewsHour

text:
@Yamiche Please stop covering the conferences. Join with some other journalists to find some other way to get info from the experts. Trump is just using the pressers as campaigning and you all being there gives legitimacy. 
#NotMyPresident 
#VoteBlueToSaveAmerica
#coronavirus
